H0.text: Who plays the bounty hunter Carson Wells in the 2007 film ‘No Country For Old Men’. Josh Brolin

H1.text: Who plays the bounty hunter Carson Wells in the 2007 film ‘No Country For Old Men’. Javier Bardem

H2.text: Who plays the bounty hunter Carson Wells in the 2007 film ‘No Country For Old Men’. Tommy Lee Jones

H3.text: Who plays the bounty hunter Carson Wells in the 2007 film ‘No Country For Old Men’. Woody Harelson

A4.text: Jones played a Texas sheriff hunting an assassin in No Country for Old Men

A5.text: Woody Harrelson played Carson Wells in No Country for Old Men.

A6.text: Javier Bardem played Anton Chigurh in No Country for Old Men.
